title: Two horses were sold at Rs 1599 each. First was sold at 25% profit and second at 20% loss. Find the over all profit or loss %? - Quora

response.answer_text: Loss - 2.439% Explanation- 1st horse Sold at 1599 including profit of 25% Cost is 1279.2 2nd horse Sold at 1599 including loss of 20% Cost is 1998.75 Total Sell price 3198 Cost 3277.95 Loss 2.439%

First horse sold at Rs 1599 , at 25% profit Cost = 100/125 *1599 = Rs 1279.20 Second horse sold at Rs 1599 , at 20% loss Cost = 100/80 *1599 = Rs 1998.75 Total cost = Rs 1998.75 + Rs 1279.20 = Rs 3277.95 Total sale value =Rs1599*2 = Rs 3198 Loss = Rs 79.95 Loss % = 79.95 /3277.95 *100 = 7995/3277.95 = 2.439% Loss ANSWER
